Two Diagrams

Diagram 1, Image

The diagram depicts an example of social engineering. A social engineer phones an unsuspecting employee from X Y Z Corp. to obtain their username and password to infiltrate the X Y Z Corp. network. There are speech bubbles in the diagram, as follows:

Social engineer, "Hi this is Amy from the help desk. We need to upgrade the software on your computer after work hours. What is your user ID and password? You can change the password tomorrow when you log in."
Employee at X Y Z Corp., "Ok, my user ID and password are..."
